snippet: Ms. Grimes was with Viking, a Penguin imprint, since 1999. Her contract with Scribner, a Simon & Schuster division, is for three books.
abstract: Ms. Grimes was with Viking, a Penguin imprint, since 1999. Her contract with Scribner, a Simon & Schuster division, is for three books.

headline.main: Martha Grimes, Creator of Richard Jury Mysteries, Is Moving to Scribner
